title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, changes are made immediately.
OB: When a working set with one project is created and selected, the package view is filtered accordingly.
EB: The package view should not be immediately filtered when a working set is removed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Remove the working set and observe the package view.
